title: What are things required to start a guitar YouTube channel? - Quora

response.answer_text: I am not quiet experienced in the YouTube thing but in my opinion things that are necessary are. 1.A good knowledge about the guitar theory. 2.Clarity while playing the instrument. 3. Good amp, processor, guitar, camera, video editing skills, song selection if u are doing covers. If u have this i things you are good to go.

I will list them below: A GuitarYour mobileCheap tripod (₹500at most)A 3.5mm male to 6.5mm male audio jackEither u need a computer and use an open source software named Audacity for recording your pieces or, u need to find an app on play store which allows you to record through mic port.
